name: MountTabor
0:
”Alexa, open mount tabor”
”Alexa, ask mount tabor for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start mount tabor”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mount tabor
des: Listen to the latest message from Mount Tabor. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
